short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides parts of Linkedin that are unneeded/addictive: feed, news, ads.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Block the feed and sponsored linkedin news. Allowing you to put your opinions out into the professional world without needing see what your connections are sharing!

Essentially stops you doom scrolling on Linkedin! Inspired by Kill the news feed and Youtube unhooked!
